message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I believe it holds immense value for your business, and I'm confident it will be a game-changer.  My initial offer is $1,000,000. I'm open to discussing this further and finding a price that works for both of us.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $900,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I acknowledge the value you see in the product, $900,000 doesn't quite meet my expectations. I'm willing to compromise and come down to $950,000. This price reflects the product's significant potential and the value it will bring to your company. Let's see if we can find common ground.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $925,000.
